title: Textile, 1995-50-205, ca. 1820
medium: Printed by engraved plate on cotton plain weave.
dimensions:
Warp: 150cm (59in.). Weft: 84.5cm (33 1/4in.)
Height of repeat: 39cm (15 1/4in.)
Width of plate: 84cm (33in.)
description: Four scenes, captioned in French, illustrating courtship and marriage. In purple on white.
